title: lewinb
text:
How to use
Use the lewinb_merge cli command!

!lewinb_merge -h

usage: lewinb_merge [-h] owner repo pull_number

positional arguments:
  owner
  repo
  pull_number

optional arguments:
  -h, --help   show this help message and exit

title: core
text:
source

get_id

 get_id (owner, repo, pull_number)

Get the node id of the PR
You can get the node id (which is used in graphql like this):

get_id('hamelsmu', 'lewinb', 3)

'PR_kwDOJKp2GM5MReJZ'



assert 1 == 1


source


merge_pr

 merge_pr (owner, repo, pull_number)
